levels.description: Increases the ATK of the next attack to <@ba.vup>{pasngr_s_1.atk_scale:0%}</>; The attack will jump between at most <@ba.vup>{pasngr_s_1.max_target}</> enemies and the duration of the <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> is increased to <@ba.vup>{pasngr_s_1.sluggish}</> seconds
